results.title: Diabetes mellitus and gynecologic cancer: molecular mechanisms, epidemiological, clinical and prognostic perspectives.
results.text_hl: Antidiabetic agents have been correlated with elevated @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ risk, while @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ seems to lower the risk.

citations.NLM: Vrachnis N, Iavazzo C, Iliodromiti Z, Sifakis S, Alexandrou A, Siristatidis C, Grigoriadis C, Botsis D, Creatsas G. Diabetes mellitus and gynecologic cancer: molecular mechanisms, epidemiological, clinical and prognostic perspectives. Arch Gynecol Obstet. 2016 Feb;293(2):239-46. PMID: 26338721
